searchUrl.title: Search URL (Optional)
searchUrl.description: Direct Monster.com search URL to scrape from. If provided, other search parameters will be ignored. Example: https://www.monster.com/jobs/search?q=admin&where=&page=1&so=m.h.s

searchQuery.title: Search Query
searchQuery.description: Job title or keywords to search for (e.g., 'admin', 'software engineer', 'data analyst'). Required if searchUrl is not provided.

location.title: Location
location.description: Location to search for jobs (e.g., 'New York, NY', 'Remote', 'California'). Leave empty for all locations.

maxJobs.title: Maximum Jobs
maxJobs.description: Maximum number of job listings to scrape (0 = unlimited). Default is 20 for optimal performance.

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of result pages to fetch across HTTP/Browser (0 = unlimited). Lower values keep runs fast and cheap.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for bypassing anti-bot protection. Recommended for reliable scraping.
